A Celebration of Fries

Waffle Fry Facts

In my opinion, waffle fries are the more versatile cousin of the crinkle-cut fry. The grooves on these fries have even more surface area and their scoop ability cannot be compared. Arguably the waffle fry has the best geometry for consumption.
